name: Simple Show Date
author: Come2theweb

sections.description:
Add today date anywhere on your website with simple way by using this plugin, this plugin make very easy steps for user to add today date, tomorrow date, day after tomorrow date, 2 day ahead date, previous date without having technical knowledge, just install & activate plugin and go to Show Date menu will appear, also you will get setting page where you can choose style / type. You can add your custom created date format, very simple and easy to use this plugin, you can try one time, and you will not face any code confliction issue with this plugin.

Features

  • Show today date
  • Show tomorrow date
  • Show previous date
  • Fully Compatible to all devices
  • Without conflict with any other plugin or code
  • Fully Responsive
  • Shortcode provided
  • Custom formats create
  • Video Tutorial
  • Free to Use
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload simple-show-date folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to setting page and choose your shortcode.
  4. Copy shortcode and paste where you want to show date, That’s All
sections.faq:
How can i add today date on my website?

You simply have to install plugin then activate and take shortcode from setting page, that’s all

How can i show yesterday date?

You can go to setting page and see you will get -day or + day option.

Can i add custom date format?

Yes, just go to setting page and choose custom style, and you can see code for day, month, year etc.

Can my date visible on desktop & mobile both?

Yes, by default it will visible on mobile & desktop both, if you want to write some css, you can write with class name.

Are you facing any other issue with this plugin?

Yes, – Ok please write a mail at support@come2theweb.com or submit your query in support we will get back to you within 24 hours.
